nodes.text: Temple of Phantoms is a comic story featured in the ninth issue of the Star Wars Comic UK magazine, released in August of 2014. The story centers on a young Anakin Skywalker fighting a dark-side entity inside the Jedi Temple.
Approximately five years before the Battle of Geonosis, Anakin Skywalker is in the Jedi Temple on Coruscant, when he hears a strange sibilant voice that Tiplee, who is with him, cannot hear.

Later, during a lesson with Master Tera Sinube, Anakin is apparently choked by someone he cannot see. That night, he hears that voice saying "Skywalker," and he goes to the Jedi Council Chamber, where he meets a dark-side entity who engages a lightsaber duel with him and tells him that he will turn to the dark side. At that point, some Jedi Initiates materialize asking Anakin for help, and the entity blasts him with Force lightning. An agonizing Anakin then starts thinking of Padmé Amidala, who, whilst on Naboo, for some reason senses this, somehow making the entity disappear, together with the younglings. As Obi-Wan Kenobi and Yoda arrive, Anakin starts being weak, and the two Masters reflect about the few words Anakin says.
